title: Carlos Slim
summary: Carlos Slim Helú (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈkaɾlos esˈlim eˈlu]; born 28 January 1940) is a Mexican business magnate, investor and philanthropist.[1][2] From 2010 to 2013, Slim was ranked as the richest person in the world by the Forbes business magazine.[3][4] He derived his fortune from his extensive holdings in a considerable number of Mexican companies through his conglomerate, Grupo Carso.[5] As of October 2021, he was ranked as the sixteenth-richest person in the world according to Bloomberg Billionaires Index, with a net worth estimated at $62.6 billion.[6] He is the richest person in Latin America.[6]
